radiographic_examinations.findings: No abnormal findings except for a slightly enlarged right lobe of the liver.
Changes consistent with chronic HBV infection with moderate disease activity and moderate-to-severe fibrosis, moderate large-droplet fatty change, and mild hepatocytic and Kupffer cell iron overload.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: No changes in serological test results for HBV, and transaminase levels remained elevated.
